text: Hagi hazenke zamo'a ana agumpi ana agumpi huno zamagritera ne-enigeno, ana zamofo agenkemo'a ana agumpi ana agumpi huno egahie. Kasnampa vahe'mo'zama ava'nagna zama ke'zama zamasamisagura nehakesageno, pristi vahe'mo'zama kasegema rempi huzmi'zamo'a fanane nehanigeno, ranra vahe'mo'zama antahintahima zami'zamo'enena fanane hugahie.
